00020 
00021 #include "oclog.h"
00022 
00023 #define PREFIXLEN 8
00024 #define MAXTAGS 256
00025 #define OCTAGDFALT "Log";
00026 
00027 static int oclogginginitialized = 0;
00028 static int oclogging = 0;
00029 static int ocsystemfile = 0; /* 1 => we are logging to file we did not open */
00030 static char* oclogfile = NULL;
00031 static FILE* oclogstream = NULL;
00032 
00033 static int octagsize = 0;
00034 static char** octagset = NULL;
00035 static char* octagdfalt = NULL;
00036 static char* octagsetdfalt[] = {"Warning","Error","Note","Debug"};
00037 static char* octagname(int tag);
00038 
00045 void
00046 ocloginit(void)
00047 {
00048     const char* file;
00049     if(oclogginginitialized)
00050     return;
00051     oclogginginitialized = 1;
00052     file = getenv(OCENVFLAG);
00053     ocsetlogging(0);
00054     oclogfile = NULL;
00055     oclogstream = NULL;
00056     /* Use environment variables to preset oclogging state*/
00057     /* I hope this is portable*/
00058     if(file != NULL && strlen(file) > 0) {
00059         if(oclogopen(file)) {
00060         ocsetlogging(1);
00061     }
00062     }
00063     octagdfalt = OCTAGDFALT;
00064     octagset = octagsetdfalt;
00065 }
00066 
00075 int
00076 ocsetlogging(int tf)
00077 {
00078     int was;
00079     if(!oclogginginitialized) ocloginit();
00080     was = oclogging;
00081     oclogging = tf;
00082     return was;
00083 }
00084 
00095 int
00096 oclogopen(const char* file)
00097 {
00098     if(!oclogginginitialized) ocloginit();
00099     oclogclose();
00100     if(file == NULL || strlen(file) == 0) {
00101     /* use stderr*/
00102     oclogstream = stderr;
00103     oclogfile = NULL;
00104     ocsystemfile = 1;
00105     } else if(strcmp(file,"stdout") == 0) {
00106     /* use stdout*/
00107     oclogstream = stdout;
00108     oclogfile = NULL;
00109     ocsystemfile = 1;
00110     } else if(strcmp(file,"stderr") == 0) {
00111     /* use stderr*/
00112     oclogstream = stderr;
00113     oclogfile = NULL;
00114     ocsystemfile = 1;
00115     } else {
00116     int fd;
00117     oclogfile = strdup(file);
00118     oclogstream = NULL;
00119     /* We need to deal with this file carefully
00120        to avoid unauthorized access*/
00121     fd = open(oclogfile,O_WRONLY|O_APPEND|O_CREAT,0600);
00122     if(fd >= 0) {
00123         oclogstream = fdopen(fd,"a");
00124     } else {
00125         free(oclogfile);
00126         oclogfile = NULL;
00127         oclogstream = NULL;
00128         ocsetlogging(0);
00129         return 0;
00130     }
00131     ocsystemfile = 0;
00132     }
00133     return 1;
00134 }
00135 
00136 void
00137 oclogclose(void)
00138 {
00139     if(!oclogginginitialized) ocloginit();
00140     if(oclogstream != NULL && !ocsystemfile) {
00141     fclose(oclogstream);
00142     }
00143     if(oclogfile != NULL) free(oclogfile);
00144     oclogstream = NULL;
00145     oclogfile = NULL;
00146     ocsystemfile = 0;
00147 }
00148 
00158 void
00159 oclog(int tag, const char* fmt, ...)
00160 {
00161     va_list args;
00162     char* prefix;
00163 
00164     if(!oclogginginitialized) ocloginit();
00165 
00166     if(!oclogging || oclogstream == NULL) return;
00167 
00168     prefix = octagname(tag);
00169     fprintf(oclogstream,"%s:",prefix);
00170 
00171     if(fmt != NULL) {
00172       va_start(args, fmt);
00173       vfprintf(oclogstream, fmt, args);
00174       va_end( args );
00175     }
00176     fprintf(oclogstream, "\n" );
00177     fflush(oclogstream);
00178 }
00179 
00180 void
00181 oclogtext(int tag, const char* text)
00182 {
00183     oclogtextn(tag,text,strlen(text));
00184 }
00185 
00195 void
00196 oclogtextn(int tag, const char* text, size_t count)
00197 {
00198     if(!oclogging || oclogstream == NULL) return;
00199     fwrite(text,1,count,oclogstream);
00200     fflush(oclogstream);
00201 }
00202 
00203 /* The tagset is null terminated */
00204 void
00205 oclogsettags(char** tagset, char* dfalt)
00206 {
00207     octagdfalt = dfalt;
00208     if(tagset == NULL) {
00209     octagsize = 0;
00210     } else {
00211         int i;
00212     /* Find end of the tagset */
00213     for(i=0;i<MAXTAGS;i++) {if(tagset[i]==NULL) break;}
00214     octagsize = i;
00215     }
00216     octagset = tagset;
00217 }
00218 
00219 static char*
00220 octagname(int tag)
00221 {
00222     if(tag < 0 || tag >= octagsize) {
00223     return octagdfalt;
00224     } else {
00225     return octagset[tag];
00226     }
00227 }
